ItemType.name: baseball cap
ItemType.desc: The standard-issue hat for baseball-armed soldiers everywhere.

ItemType.name: Hardy Hard Hardhat
ItemType.desc: WOW!!! ANOTHER JOKE!!! HARDY HAR HAR!!! WHOEVER WRITES THESE DESCRIPTIONS OUGHT TO SHUT UP!!!11111111111

ItemType.name: Softie Softcap
ItemType.desc: This cap makes you want to work extra hard just to prove that you're not a softie.

ItemType.name: laser helmet
ItemType.desc: This futuristic helmet comes with a laser turret mounted on top and guide-goggles for easy firing

ItemType.name: The Blockhead
ItemType.desc: Originally marketed as "combat goggles," this modified metal block serves as effective all-around head protection

ItemType.name: tinfoil hat
ItemType.desc: This tinfoil hat protects your brain from harmless radio waves. Not so good against not-so-harmless metal bullets, though.

ItemType.name: arm mount
ItemType.desc: This arm brace has a mount to hold one weapon

ItemType.name: Bulletball glove
ItemType.desc: In the far future, cyborgs play an extreme version of baseball known as bulletball. These metal mittens are used to catch high-velocity bulletballs in flight.

ItemType.name: The Pitcher
ItemType.desc: When all you have is a robotic arm mounted over your shoulder, everything else looks like a baseball.

ItemType.name: The Trebuchet
ItemType.desc: This robotic armor allows you to launch grenades farther than a catapult can.

ItemType.name: The Rocket Ranger
ItemType.desc: For the kind of sniper who is too cool for bullets.

ItemType.name: The Cookie Jar
ItemType.desc: This little chip of a grenade will really cook your enemies to a chocolate crisp in a jarring explosion.

ItemType.name: The Parashooter
ItemType.desc: This gun-on-a-parachute is designed to let you fight from the air.

ItemType.name: Laser Dart gun
ItemType.desc: This toy gun shoots red plastic rods (dubbed 'Lasers') at a velocity that is not safe for a kids' toy.

ItemType.name: The Passive Pipsqueak Pistol
ItemType.desc: This wimpy pistol is too chicken to shoot anyone in the face. Be sure to aim from behind for most damage.

ItemType.name: Ruby's Railgun
ItemType.desc: You don't know who Ruby is, but you do know that someone had to spend a lot of money to make this gem-encrusted experimental railgun.

ItemType.name: The Springbow
ItemType.desc: Someone had the great idea of taking a crossbow and replacing the firing mechanism with a spring.

ItemType.name: The Crossy Bow
ItemType.desc: This crossbow is always ready to shoot an arrow across the road.

ItemType.name: The Cherry Picker
ItemType.desc: Shoot them in the weak spot for massive damage!

ItemType.name: The Scientific Railgun
ItemType.desc: Unlike other railguns, this railgun was made by scientists, FOR scientists!

ItemType.name: The Automassive Rifle
ItemType.desc: Somebody thought that a railgun could be made as fast and portable as a rifle. Someone really did not think this through.

ItemType.name: The Hand Rail
ItemType.desc: For anyone who has the strength to lift 50 kilograms or more, this railgun can be considered portable.

ItemType.name: The Smart Gun
ItemType.desc: Just like its inventors, this futuristic high-tech gun spends way too much time on the internet and cannot function without it.

ItemType.name: The Civilian Casualty
ItemType.desc: The weapon of choice for serial killers, dictators, and serial dictators who know not to waste expensive armor-piercing ammo on soft targets.

ItemType.name: The Cheap Shot
ItemType.desc: This pistol may be rudimentary and unstylish, but at least it can get the dirty deeds done dirt cheap.

ItemType.name: The Dust
ItemType.desc: Bite this bullet, I say! Bite it!

ItemType.name: Metal Pipe Device
ItemType.desc: Whoever made this strange contraption apparently lived in a world where the only available chassis was a metal pipe. If only you could know which kind of metal the pipe was made of...

ItemType.name: Silicon Pipe Device (Electronwave Paralyzer)
ItemType.desc: An experimental prototype of a possibly revolutionary energy beam weapon, built out of a silicon pipe by who knows who.

Noise.Weak: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device mumbles a plain old Thud
Noise.Strong: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device sings the signature clang of a Silicon Pipe Device

ItemType.name: Wood Pipe Device (The Divine Inferno)
ItemType.desc: Normally, you would say, "Why would you build a flamethrower from a metal pipe that is actually made out of wood?!" But if you were a Crazy Idea Connoisseur, you would instead say, "Because building a flamethrower from a metal pipe that is actually made out of wood is a brilliant idea!" And if you were a thief, then you would sneak past the distracted Crazy Ideas Connoisseur into his house in order to steal his flamethrower built from a metal pipe that is actually made out of wood and die trying to use it in some pointless island war.

Noise.Weak: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device mumbles a plain old Thud
Noise.Strong: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device sings the signature clang of a Wood Pipe Device

ItemType.name: Brass Pipe Device (Brasswind Blowdart Gun)
ItemType.desc: Fool your enemies into thinking that you're totally not a poison-shooting secret-agent sniper assassin super soldier by carrying this totally innocuous war trumpet! Works best if you're a member of the battlefield marching band!

Noise.Weak: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device mumbles a plain old Thud
Noise.Strong: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device sings the signature clang of a Brass Pipe Device

ItemType.name: Lead Pipe Device (Lead Pipe)
ItemType.desc: This Metal Pipe Device seems to be nothing more than an ordinary lead pipe that was taken from an Ancient Roman aqueduct.

Noise.Weak: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device mumbles a plain old Thud
Noise.Strong: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device sings the signature clang of a Lead Pipe Device

ItemType.name: Gold Pipe Device (Gold Bar)
ItemType.desc: Well, this is embarrassing. Looks like this Metal Pipe Device is not even a pipe; It’s just a useless bar of gold.

Noise.Weak: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device mumbles a plain old Thud
Noise.Strong: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device sings the signature clang of a Gold Pipe Device

ItemType.name: Steel Pipe Device (Steel Murderbar)
ItemType.desc: What you initially thought was an ordinary Metal Pipe Device turned out to be nothing more than a bundle of crowbars tied together to form one sharp and terrifying weapon.

Noise.Weak: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device mumbles a plain old Thud
Noise.Strong: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device sings the signature clang of a Steel Pipe Device

ItemType.name: Aluminum Pipe Device (Pipe Bomb)
ItemType.desc: One swing with this heavy bomb could bad disfigure an enemy soldier. Throwing also works.

Noise.Weak: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device mumbles a plain old Thud
Noise.Strong: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device sings the signature clang of a Aluminum Pipe Device

ItemType.name: Tungsten Pipe Device (The Tungsten Shot To Blow The Brain Stem Out)
ItemType.desc: This is just a Special Forces sniper rifle disguised as a tungsten pipe. Why a pipe and not something that would look less suspicious in the hands of the average civilian? Nobody knows.

Noise.Weak: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device mumbles a plain old Thud
Noise.Strong: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device sings the signature clang of a Tungsten Pipe Device

ItemType.name: Arsenic Pipe Device (The Forbidden Arsenal)
ItemType.desc: This is the first ever and last ever rocket launcher to be made out of the first ever and last ever arsenic pipe to be made. Drop it before it kills you!

Noise.Weak: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device mumbles a plain old Thud
Noise.Strong: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device sings the signature clang of an Arsenic Pipe Device

ItemType.name: Radium Pipe Device (The Radioactive Romantic)
ItemType.desc: The creator of this weapon's radioactive chassis never lived to see anyone use it to spray deadly nerve gas, let alone go near it without dying a few days later.

Noise.Weak: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device mumbles a plain old Thud
Noise.Strong: The strike of the Metal Pipe Device sings the signature clang of a Radium Pipe Device
